channel.title: About Flax

item.title: About Flax
item.dc:creator: @Vladie Vladie
item.description:
@Vladie wrote:

Okay so I was trying to add flax today so I made the case

case 2646: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You pick some flax"); setAnimation(881); addItem(1779, 1); addSkillXP(50, 12); actionTimer = 3; } break;
You think it would work? But it doesn’t. If you could help me with this please do so.

Someone be nice and help ehh?
Also my “xteletome” and “xteleto” command’s aren’t working. If you have those working commands could you please port them here.

-Thanks all-

Read full topic
